transliteration.hi: लसकै उरि राकस के मध यौ उपमा तिह की कबि भाख दई ॥
transliteration.ipa: ləsəkæ oʊr rɑkəs ke mət̪ə̀ jɒ oʊpəmɑ t̪ɪh ki kəb ɓɑkʰ d̪ei.

verse.gurmukhi: mno rwhu ibcwr kY pUrb bYr ko sUrj kI kir lIl leI ]1317]
verse.unicode: ਮਨੋ ਰਾਹੁ ਬਿਚਾਰ ਕੈ ਪੂਰਬ ਬੈਰ ਕੋ ਸੂਰਜ ਕੀ ਕਰਿ ਲੀਲ ਲਈ ॥੧੩੧੭॥

en.bdb: That Shakti driven in the body looked like the sun swallowed by Rahu on remembering its enmity.1317.

ss.gurmukhi: mwno rwhU ny pUrblw vYr ivcwr ky, sUrj dI ikrn nUM ingl ilAw hovy ]1317]

bdb.gurmukhi: mwno rwhU ny pUrblw vYr ivcwr ky, sUrj dI ikrn nUM ingl ilAw hovy ]1317]

en.bdb: With the infliction of the dagger, that mighty warrior breathed his last and all the mighty warriors, having fears in their minds, lamented.1318.

verse.gurmukhi: so kurUp Aivlok kY sih n sikE duKu bIr ]1319]
verse.unicode: ਸੋ ਕੁਰੂਪ ਅਵਿਲੋਕ ਕੈ ਸਹਿ ਨ ਸਕਿਓ ਦੁਖੁ ਬੀਰ ॥੧੩੧੯॥

en.bdb: When the heroic Shakti Singh killed Vikartanan, Kurup could not endure the sorrow of the death of his brother.1319.
